title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Contact our support team anytime.

pricing.question: How is the pricing calculated?
pricing.answer: We offer flexible pricing plans based on your usage and needs. The Starter plan is suitable for individual users, the Professional plan for teams, and the Enterprise plan can be customized. All plans support monthly or annual billing, with a 20% discount for annual payments.

trial.question: Do you offer a free trial?
trial.answer: Yes! We offer a 30-day free trial for all new users, no credit card required. During the trial period, you can experience all professional features without any restrictions.

support.question: What kind of technical support do you provide?
support.answer: We provide multi-tiered technical support. Starter users can access community forums and documentation, Professional users enjoy email support, and Enterprise users have dedicated account managers and 24/7 phone support.

security.question: How is data security guaranteed?
security.answer: We employ industry-leading security measures, including SSL encryption, regular backups, multi-factor authentication, and more. All data is stored in SOC2-compliant data centers to ensure your information is absolutely secure.

integration.question: Do you support third-party integrations?
integration.answer: Yes, we support 100+ mainstream tool integrations, including Slack, Gmail, Salesforce, Zapier, and more. We also provide RESTful APIs and Webhooks for custom integration development.

cancel.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: You can cancel your subscription anytime in your account settings, no questions asked. After cancellation, you can still use the service until the end of your current billing cycle, after which your account will automatically downgrade to the free version.
